result.reason: RDP Gateway credential dialog appears behind main window due to missing TopMost/BringToFront handling on the AxMsRdpClient credential prompt
result.approach: Handle the OnAuthenticationWarningDisplayed or OnReceivedTSPublicKey event to bring the gateway auth dialog to foreground, or set the parent window handle so credential prompts appear in the correct z-order
